title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.13 - Filing of SEQR documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.13 - Filing of SEQR documents

State Regulations

The authority shall maintain files in its offices that will
be available for public inspection of all environmental document review
notices, memoranda of review, negative declarations, notices of determination, notices of completion of draft and final EIS's, notices of public hearing, draft and final EIS's and other decisions it has prepared or caused to be
prepared. Copies of draft and final EIS's shall be available to the public at
cost. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2500.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
